8.13.21  9:19 pm   hi bill. i originally thought the lyrics to JoJo - "Too little too late"" at the end of the chorus were "And be real, it doesn't hurt anyway...", and as a result that part of the song always hit me like a truck and felt so much more meaningful. but recently i discovered that the actual lyrics are "To be real, it doesn't matter anyway" and now i'm sad because i can't unhear those very inferior lyrics.
